trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around July 9th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was at 37th st on the northwest side of indianapolis at work. i was doing security at a soccer game. the time was around 6:35p.m. and it was halftime. i just so happened to look up in the sky and noticed an object that looked like a white\gray balloon. i strained my eyes at first, i figured it might of been a plane or helicopter because the airport was about 6miles south of my location. they started to get lower and lower. the more i observed it hovered in one spot then it moved within the blink of an eye east. i was in shock i couldn't stop staring at it. i couldn't take my eyes of it them i felt like they new i was watching. it moved back in forth, then appeared 4 more of the same objects. they all got in formation, like the shape of a boomerang. there was a total of 5 ufo's. they drop almost down to cloud level then 1 by 1 they vanished straight up back into space with a blink of an eye.
